alert.note: Alert for Madison (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 22 at 8:09PM CST until February 22 at 8:30PM CST by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM CST FOR NORTHWESTERN MADISON COUNTY... At 808 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Hazel Green, or near Meridianville, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Northern Huntsville, Moores Mill, Meridianville, Hazel Green, New Market, Harvest, Toney, Elkwood, Plevna and Fisk. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CST for north central, northeastern and northwestern Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
